tr_quotes.quote: İçinizde, her an inzivaya çekilip kendiniz olabileceğiniz bir dingin yer ve bir tapınak bulunur.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün, endişe duyduğunuz dünün yarınıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Gülümse, nefes al ve yavaş yavaş git.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Dağların tepelerinde bulacağınız tek Zen, sizin oraya çıkaracağınız Zendir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

tr_quotes.quote: İki arzuyu ayıran aralıkta sakinlik hüküm sürüyor. Bu, tüm düşüncelerden, aşktan veya nefretten kurtulma anıdır
tr_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

tr_quotes.quote: Aceleyle yapılanlar asla iyi yapılmaz; her zaman sakin davranın.
tr_quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

tr_quotes.quote: Nefes almayı bırakmadıkça, yanlışlarınızdan daha çok doğrularınız vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen koca bir gün içerisindeki en önemli şey iki derin nefes arasındaki dinlenmemizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

tr_quotes.quote: Sükûnet gerçek zekanın en iyi cevabıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Euripides

tr_quotes.quote: En sağlıklı karar ancak sükûnet içinde verilir.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Bozdağ

tr_quotes.quote: Cahil kimsenin yanında kitap gibi sessiz ol.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlâna

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey sakin olduğu zaman, bir şeyler oluyor demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Elezar Benyoetz

tr_quotes.quote: İzlenmesi gerekenler, sakin görünenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Glenn Meade

tr_quotes.quote: Sükûnet için kulübeyi saraya her zaman tercih et!
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

tr_quotes.quote: Güvensizlik dolu, bir sakinlik içindeyim.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Haklı olduğunuza inanıyorsanız, sakin olmayı başarabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bud Holiday

tr_quotes.quote: Şiddetli fırtınanın arkasından sükunet gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Miguel D. Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Sükunet güç demektir. Kalbinize şöyle deyin: Sakin ol ve öyle kal.
tr_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

tr_quotes.quote: Sakin ve mutlu bir hayata, ancak fazilet yolundan varılabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Juvenalis

tr_quotes.quote: Ölmek güzel, ölmek sakin, ölmek korkutucu değil; durgun bir liman.
tr_quotes.author: Zülfü Livaneli

tr_quotes.quote: Etrafındaki her şey çılgınken, sakin kalmak dâhicedir.
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

tr_quotes.quote: Toprak gibi sessiz olduğum an bil ki; şimşek gibi gökte gürlüyor feryadım.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlâna

tr_quotes.quote: Sessizlikle cehaleti, sakinlikle kabulü, şefkatle zayıflığı asla karıştırmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni yıla girmeden önce her zaman melankolik bir sessizlik vardır!
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

tr_quotes.quote: Ama neşeden de iyisi sükunetti. Sakinlik, güvenilir bir durumdu.
tr_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Sükûneti kendi içimizde bulamazsak, başka yerde aramak imkansızdır.
tr_quotes.author: La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Sürekli koşan kişi, sakin kalıp düşünenden hep daha az şey bilir.
tr_quotes.author: Mario Mazzanti

tr_quotes.quote: Suskunluk huzur içeriyor; Sakinlik, dinginlik. Yaşam düğmesinin sesini kısmak gibi.
tr_quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan, ne derece sakinleşirse; başarısı, nüfuzu ve iyilik kudreti o derece artar.
tr_quotes.author: James Ailen

tr_quotes.quote: Senin bardağını kırdıkları vakit de komşunun bardağı kırıldığı zamanki kadar, sakin olmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: Epictetos

tr_quotes.quote: Sakinlik maskesi takmış olsa da mavi gözleri söylemesi gerekenden daha fazlasını söylemişti.
tr_quotes.author: Gail McHugh

tr_quotes.quote: Gürültü ve patırtının ortasında sükûnetle dolaş, sessizliğin içinde huzur bulduğunu unutma.
tr_quotes.author: Budha

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen insanları sadece izlersin. Garip bir sakinlikle; kızmazsın, üzülmezsin, kırılmazsın. Hissettiğin sadece sessizliktir, sadece sessizlik.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sakinlik ülkesine ulaşmak için fırtınalar ülkesinin içinden geçmelisin. Bütün cennetler zorlu mücadele gerektirir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Pek çok fırtınayı yaşamış bir adam ya sakinliğe tapacaktır ya da sakinlikten nefret edecektir!
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

tr_quotes.quote: Mademki aşk ile saadet ne kadar mümkün değilse, aşk ile namus da o kadar imkansızdır. O hâlde namusla sakinlik ve daha elbette tercih olunur.
tr_quotes.author: Mehmet Rauf

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı insanlarda her zaman olan 2 şey vardır. Gülümsemek ve sakinlik. Problemleri çözmek için gülümse, problemleri önlemek için sakin ol.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

tr_quotes.quote: Habis olmayan kişinin yaşamında gördüğümüz şey sakinlik değildir; tam tersine, özellikle yalın ve bakir bir katılık ve hoşgörüsüzlüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

tr_quotes.quote: Ama neşeden de iyisi...Sükumetti.Sakinlik,güvenilir bir durumdu
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sessizlikle cehaleti,sakinlikle kabulü,şefkatle zayıflığı asla karıştırmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sakinlik maskesi takmış olsa da mavi gözleri söylemesi gerekenden fazlasını söylüyordu.
tr_quotes.author: Gail McHugh

tr_quotes.quote: Sakinlik ülkesi'ne ulaşmak için fırtınalar ülkesi'nin içinden geçmelisin!Bütün cennetler zorlu mucadele gerektirir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Deniz sakin olduğu zaman,büyük dalgalar kıyılara çarpmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öfkenin karşıtı sakinlik değildir.Anlayıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dün geçti, yarın gelmedi, öfkelenme, sakin ol..
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Cahil kimsenin yanında kitap gibi sessiz ol.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı insanlarda her zaman olan iki şey vardır.Gülümsemek ve sakinlik.Problemleri çözmek için gülümse,problemleri önlemek için sakin ol.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sakin kalmayı öğrendiğinizde, gerçekten sakin kalıp hayatının akışına izin verdiğinizde, parlayacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

tr_quotes.quote: En sakin yolculuk uykudur.
tr_quotes.author: Tevfik Fikret

tr_quotes.quote: Gürültü ve karmaşanın ortasından sakince geç,sessizlikte ne büyük bir huzur olduğunu hatırlayarak...
tr_quotes.author: Jorge Semprun

en_quotes.quote: Stay centered by accepting whatever happens to you. This is the ultimate.
en_quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

en_quotes.quote: The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought – they must be earned.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Your life will be in order when disorder ceases to bother you.
en_quotes.author: James Pierce

en_quotes.quote: People should learn how to just be there, doing nothing.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: You can’t force raging water to be calm. You have to leave it alone and let it return to its natural flow. Emotions are the same way.
Insight emerges out of silence.
en_quotes.author: B. D. Schiers

en_quotes.quote: When we are unable to find tranquility within ourselves, it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
en_quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.
en_quotes.author: Dogen

en_quotes.quote: Understand: presence of mind is the ability to detach yourself, to see the whole battlefield, the whole picture, with clarity.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Those who act with few desires are calm, without worry or fear.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: To be calm is the highest achievement of the self.
en_quotes.author: Zen proverb

en_quotes.quote: Decide that wherever you are, is the best place there is. Once you start comparing, there’s no end to it.
en_quotes.author: Sodo Yokoyama

en_quotes.quote: Fear of change is a human instinct. Embracing change is a superhuman ability.
en_quotes.author: Justin Kan

en_quotes.quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
en_quotes.author: Chinese proverb

en_quotes.quote: No state is so bitter than a calm mind cannot find in it some consolation.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Rushing into action, you fail. Trying to grasp things, you lose them. Forcing a project to completion, you ruin what was almost ripe.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: With no desire, at rest and still, all things go right as of their will.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: If you relax, it comes. If you relax, it is there. If you relax, you start vibrating with it.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Everything that happens is as simple and familiar as the rose in spring, the fruit in summer: disease, death, blasphemy, conspiracy… everything that makes stupid people happy and angry.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: To shrug it all off and wipe it clean — every annoyance and distraction — and reach utter stillness. Child’s play.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: The smarter you get, the more you appreciate silence.
On average, the deeper people’s knowledge of a topic, the more calmly they talk about it.
en_quotes.author: Paul Graham

en_quotes.quote: An infinite reservoir of cosmic wisdom resides in the depths of contemplation.
en_quotes.author: Roy Gillett

en_quotes.quote: Attain peace with self-understanding. Attain self-understanding with silence.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Relax. You’ll live longer and perform better.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Hurrying and delaying are alike ways of trying to resist the present.
en_quotes.author: Alan Watts

en_quotes.quote: To bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength and burden.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: When completely relaxed, we experience the essence of our being, the deep silence that knows everything as it is.
en_quotes.author: Haemin Sunim

en_quotes.quote: Let come what comes, and accommodate yourself to that, whatever it is.
en_quotes.author: Henepola Gunaratana

en_quotes.quote: Some time in your day today, try to turn off all the noises you can around you, and give yourself some ‘quiet time.’ In the silence, let yourself think about something. Or if possible, think about nothing
en_quotes.author: Fred Rogers

en_quotes.quote: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you need to breathe, calm down, look around, and improvise. Creativity is the key of life.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: What you do not react to cannot drag you down in a futile engagement.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: When seeking stops, seeker relaxes and stays in his natural state.
Keep calm and carry on.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: There is peace even in the storm.
en_quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: A calm and modest life brings more happiness than the pursuit of success combined with constant restlessness.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone.
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: I will be calm. I will be mistress of myself.
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: It takes a calm mind to be able to consider things from different angles and points of view.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: A calm mind makes us relaxed, improves our health and makes for happier families and communities.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: We don’t realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders.
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: Calm seas never made a good sailor.
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I just feel that there isn’t enough silence, and I’m always asking people if they can just give some silence.
en_quotes.author: Fred Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Today I escaped anxiety. Or no, I discarded it, because it was within me, in my own perceptions — not outside.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: Life isn’t as serious as my mind makes it out to be.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Unwind, relax, and deepen into the present moment.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The most effective way to convince people is quietly.
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: Calm is a superpower.
en_quotes.author: Brené Brown

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a calm mind.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: Still waters run deep.
en_quotes.author: English proverb

en_quotes.quote: Outward action and inner calm.
Be calm. Be Zen. You are Buddha.
en_quotes.author: James Patterson

en_quotes.quote: In the madness, you have to find calm.
en_quotes.author: Lupita Nyong’o

en_quotes.quote: Take it easy, and remember “easy is right.”
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: Learn to slow down. Get lost intentionally.
en_quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

en_quotes.quote: More patience, more presence, less anxiety.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Always study to secure your permanent peace.
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Be an island of calm in the sea of craziness.
Train your mind to be calm in every situation.
The only thing you control is how you respond.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: You are the sky. Everything else – it’s just the weather.
en_quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

en_quotes.quote: In a hyperactive world, stillness is the deepest rebellion.
en_quotes.author: Donna D’Cruz

en_quotes.quote: If you get the inside right, the outside will fall into place.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety.
en_quotes.author: Aesop

en_quotes.quote: Don’t let people pull you into their storm. Pull them into your peace.
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Jones

en_quotes.quote: Remember: we don’t control what happens, we control how we respond.
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: Nothing can disturb the calm peace of my soul.
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Do you pay regular visits to yourself? Start now.
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: When you keep the peace with yourself, you also bring peace to others.
en_quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

en_quotes.quote: Being confident and outspoken is overrated. Being present and calm is underrated.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: Having a calm and compassionate mind enables us to use our natural intelligence more effectively.
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Live intensely, live totally, here and now. Paradise is not some place, somewhere. It is a peace within you.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: The existence loves you, otherwise you would not be here. Relax into your being, you are cherished by the whole.
en_quotes.author: Osho

en_quotes.quote: When the mind is calm, how quickly, how smoothly, how beautifully you will perceive everything.
en_quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

en_quotes.quote: The ability to stay calm and polite, even when people upset you, is a superpower.
en_quotes.author: Vala Afshar

en_quotes.quote: Don’t do any task in order to get it over with. Resolve to do each job in a relaxed way, with all your attention. Enjoy and be one with your work.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Before embarking on important undertakings, sit quietly, calm your senses and thoughts, and meditate deeply. You will then be guided by the great creative power of Spirit.
en_quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

en_quotes.quote: The further the reward from the effort, the thinner the competition. Patience is the gatekeeper.
en_quotes.author: Johnny Uzan

en_quotes.quote: Our best and most lasting work comes from when we take things slow.
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: If you want to be effective in business, you need a clear, calm, cool, collected mind.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again.
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: You can control so much of your state of mind just by breathing.
en_quotes.author: Justin Kan

en_quotes.quote: Family vacations are the ultimate test of one’s equanimity.
en_quotes.author: James Pierce

en_quotes.quote: The ideal of calm exists in a sitting cat.
en_quotes.author: Jules Renard

en_quotes.quote: Relax, it’s a tweet.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Always ask yourself: “What will happen if I say nothing?”
en_quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

en_quotes.quote: If solitude is the school of genius, then the crowded, busy world is the purgatory of the idiot.
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face.
en_quotes.author: Manoj Arora

en_quotes.quote: In dealing with fools you must adopt the following philosophy: they are simply a part of life, like rocks or furniture.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: When working alongside fools, do not fight them. Instead think of them the way you think of children, or pets, not important enough to affect your mental balance.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: Fame and tranquility can never be bedfellows.
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Relax: haters are secret admirers wanting to be you.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: You can’t buy a calm mind, you have to earn it.
en_quotes.author: Shane Parrish

en_quotes.quote: Until we know that death is equal to life, we live in fear.
en_quotes.author: Byron Katie

en_quotes.quote: Happiness and sadness alike are an assault on equanimity.
en_quotes.author: James Pierce

en_quotes.quote: The wise have self-understanding. The wisest have indifference too.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: At any moment, you have a choice, that either leads you closer to your spirit or further away from it.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: I’m not doing anything, and yet I’m also doing the most important thing a man can do: I’m listening to what I needed to hear from myself.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: The very desire to find shortcuts makes you eminently unsuited for any kind of mastery.
en_quotes.author: Robert Greene

en_quotes.quote: It is the vice of a vulgar mind to be thrilled by bigness.
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Do not view mountains from the scale of human thought.
en_quotes.author: Dogen

en_quotes.quote: If you want to travel the Way of Buddhas and Zen masters, then expect nothing, seek nothing, and grasp nothing.
en_quotes.author: Dogen

en_quotes.quote: Next time you have to make a decision, be sure to breathe in and out first.
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Just study Buddhism. Don’t follow the sentiments of the world.
en_quotes.author: Dogen

en_quotes.quote: When you try to stay on the surface of the water, you sink; but when you try to sink, you float.
en_quotes.author: Zen proverb

en_quotes.quote: Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes, and the grass grows by itself.
en_quotes.author: Zen proverb

en_quotes.quote: Only through constant self-awareness and self-knowledge can there be inward tranquillity.
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Once you stop seeking outside what’s already inside, you become free and calm.
en_quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

en_quotes.quote: The Master takes action by letting things take their course. He remains as calm at the end as at the beginning.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: It is not wise to rush about. If too much energy is used, exhaustion follows. This is not the way of Tao.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Best be still; best be empty. In stillness and emptiness we find where to abide. Talking and moving we lose the place.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Using order to deal with the disorderly, using calm to deal with the clamorous, is mastering the heart.
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: The ego gets what it wants with words. The soul finds what it needs in silence.
en_quotes.author: Richard Rohr

en_quotes.quote: Zen is not some special state, it is our normal condition, silent, peaceful, awake, without agitation.
en_quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of Zen is found in simplicity and tranquility, in a sense of the all-embracing harmony of things.
en_quotes.author: Thich Thien-An

en_quotes.quote: Prolong not the past. Invite not the future. Do not alter your innate wakefulness. Fear not appearances. There is nothing more than this.
en_quotes.author: Ram Dass

en_quotes.quote: The wise speak softly, for their words do not attempt to convince.
en_quotes.author: James Pierce

en_quotes.quote: The struggle is great, the task divine — to gain mastery, freedom, happiness, and tranquility.
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: When you understand something, then it naturally calms you down.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: The measure of wisdom is how calm you are when facing any given situation.
en_quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

en_quotes.quote: Everything is fine until you believe it’s not.
en_quotes.author: Byron Katie
